channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: New Orleans jail escapees caught following car chase in Texas; 2 inmates still on the run
item.description: Police say one of the New Orleans jail escapees who was captured on Monday was found with the help of an anonymous tip from a concerned citizen.

item.title: Manhunt launched for ex-police chief known as ‘Devil in the Ozarks’ after his escape from prison
Harvard agrees to relinquish early photos of slaves, ending a long legal battle
